Name: DGs
Title: Good zoo
Review: Perfect place to spend 3-4 hrs with your family specially kids. Toy train give you glimpses of the zoo all around. Children park has good slides.

Name: Shubham Srivastava
Title: Very Nice
Review: A place to enjoy with your friends and family. The history museum is also very good. Highly recommended for anyone who visits lucknow.

Name: Jayendra Gohil
Title: Nice
Review: Big Garden spacious and a small zoo based museum too, fav family outing. Plus another museum inside. Clean.

Name: Amit Shishodia
Title: Place which I visited most
Review: My fav place in Lucknow. I have visited Lucknow zoo at least 25-30 times in last 12 years. Good place to visit with family and friends. Little bit tough during the summer because of temperature. I suggest to visit this place from Oct to march.

Name: Ruby4861
Title: Childhood memories!!!
Review: We basically went to relive our memories... it was good to see that the zoo was maintained pretty well. It was clean with some new decor and greenery. The signs were good. There were animals which looked healthy...It was a good trip... sat on the train as well.

Name: Soumyajit Saha
Title: Nawab Wajid Ali Shah Zoo
Review: Nawab Wajid Ali Shah Zoo is a famous place to visit. It has many animals to watch and children will love it.

Name: Anuradha
Title: Very well maintained zoo with a museum inside
Review: We mainly wanted to go to the museum but at the ticket counter got to know that it’s mandatory to take the ticket for zoo. Initially we didn’t like the idea, but didn’t regret it after going inside. A huge Parijaat tree welcomed us, it was very beautiful. Kids love to see a great variety of animals this zoo offers. The museum was good with display of many historical artefacts specially related to Awadhi culture. Egyptian gallery was good with a mummy on display.

Name: niya27
Title: Zoo
Review: This place is also called Lucknow Zoo. This zoo is one of the best zoo in India. State museum is also inside this zoo.

Name: Tanvi
Title: My kids loved it
Review: I visited here with my family and my kids loved it . There's a entry fee also which is very less . We we're lucky enough to spot Cheetah . It is one of the best zoo I have visited ...

Name: Yogesh P
Title: Good place for visit with family
Review: Nice place for visit with family. There was small entry fees. Well cleaned and nice zoo. There was many wild animals there. Nice place to enjoy with kids.

Name: ShikshaC
Title: Lucknow Zoo vidit…
Review: The place is quite popular and has huge number of tourists coming in. It houses several varieties of birds, fishes and animals including white tigers, hippopotamus, macaws, etc. to name a few. It has a small eating area inside for snacks and is good activity for family outing. It has a toy train or battery operated cars available for trips but you can also walk. The butterfly park which has extra ticket applied is not worth the money as there are no butterflies in it.

Name: FeatureSM
Title: Knowledgeable place
Review: Hi guys this is amazing place to visit with your friends and family mostly for kids because they will learn amazing facts and more knowledge about nature.

Name: Sparkling soul
Title: Visit
Review: One of the best place to have a picnic with your loved ones be it your family or friends. Great place to visit with family specially with kid. So much to learn for them about animals and history. Museum was great to see and learn about Indian culture and history. There are Jain and Buddha era exhibition, Indian coin and weapons exhibition and so many other things. There are lots of wold animals to see.

Name: Parth101
Title: Known as Lucknow Zoo
Review: This zoo also known as Lucknow Zoo . It is located in heart of the Lacknow city area. Main attraction of the city. Good place for time spend with kids.

Name: Harsh V
Title: Fun time
Review: Best place to hangout with your family and friends best picnic place in there is 3d show and many things like boating full fun place must visit

Name: Indieopus
Title: Too Old Too Boring
Review: Not worth visiting this place as a tourist in Lucknow, though there are few good animals but the overall experience isn't that great as the place is unhygienic as well as not Maintened well!

Name: durham05
Title: One of the better zoos
Review: This site is quite large but there is lots to see with each animal cage close to the next.  There is also a nice train that runs around the park. State museum also with zoo. Liked the giraffes, hippos, tigers and lions. Lots of places to buy food  80 rupees to get in.

Name: Anshu Mishra
Title: Good Zoo with Low Facilities
Review: This is the only zoo in Lucknow and in fact nearby cities It has Tiger, Peacock ,Birds,Leopard ,Zebra ,Ziraf and many more animals and birds It also has monkeys But facilities are very less in this zoo, like parking is a biggest problem If you are visiting with kids than there is no comfortable place to sit with them Lake is dirty and not maintained There are few Electric Carts which are very less in numbers and you are. To wait for this Best part is, Plastic is ban insideIce cream  stalls are there Food shop is there in side Overall good place to visit in winters not in summer

Name: Pushpendra M
Title: GOOD EXPERIENCE
Review: I love to see animals every time so we decided to visit here. In that zoo there are many thing for kids, beautiful flowers, indian air force cargo plane.

Name: AlokKumarGupta
Title: Trip to Lucknow Zoo
Review: Apart from zoological garden, it has many other activities for Kids. My nephews very happy with the trip. They spent most of their time doing other activities like swinging, sliding, climbing and Jumping. It also has a beautiful butterfly park where you can see the different coloured butterflies and spend some time in a flowered garden.

Name: Tibor S
Title: A Day At The Zoo
Review: The Zoo has some lovely exhibits like an old Indian Air Force cargo plane and canons and garden lots of beautiful plants interesting exhibits although strange that some animals have a fantastic enclosure but others have just a cage only cost 60 indian rupees to get in although the butterfly enclisure cost an extra 20 was a fun couple of hours.Was amusing that i was the only blue eyed fair skinned westerner there so i got more interest and selfies than some of the animals, while i not a fan of animals being caged for entertainment but some zoos do great work in breeding programs and keeping some animals from becoming extinct A good afternoon out  Another great point they had purified chilled water points don't get cold water often in India

Name: Anmol Bhargava
Title: Unethical
Review: The animals in the zoo are require freedom. The caged animals were weak and the zoo is over populated.

Name: Niraj K
Title: Nice place
Review: Centrally situated in the heart of Lucknow just walking distance. Commonly known as Zoo or Banarasi Bagh. The Museum in the campus is worth seeing. Also a family picnic place. Young children will definitely enjoy the animals like Lion, tiger, zebra , deer and not to miss the Langoor who is fond of Banana and teasing you.

Name: Jeevan Shanbhag
Title: Nice Zoo with State Museum
Review: Good place to visit with family. This zoo have a toy train, E vehicles to cover entire Zoo. Also has State Museum.

Name: Sharil I
Title: A must COLD Day Visit
Review: This is one of the oldest Zoological Gardens or ZOO as we would easily call it. It helps us the animals alot as there are a lot of families available here of Birds, Monkey, Lions and fish available here.

Name: Abhineet
Title: Family outing
Review: Wonderful place for children, in fact, the whole family can enjoy its day. The toy train ride is must try for kids and museum is also good.The only thing which troubles is the Parking Facility. Authorities must work on this.

Name: Puja_deb
Title: Good collection
Review: My husband visited the zoo during our stay. Very near to Hazratganj. He was impressed by the animal collection. There was aquarium also. Good for kids.

Name: raj kamal singh
Title: My daughter's day out
Review: Since I love the nature so how can I miss this place. Some animals were difficult to see but in over all it was nice and the most import thing was that my daughter enjoyed. Food outside the zoo is not hygienic at all and over priced. The train show not that attractive.

Name: SAROJ8585
Title: THE ZOO
Review: Nawab wajid ali sah zoo is spread in a large area of 71.6 acre.The place is a hotspot for natural photography and zoology students apart from regular tourists and local visitors.

Name: Harshit
Title: Picnic spot
Review: The place is very joyful and well developed it contain a 3d show and a very huge aquarium with lots of variety of fishes which is very enjoyful for childrens and it also contain a mueseum and a train which is very popular in children my small brother was very happy in sitting on train and zoo contain large no of species of animal so if u went with family for a picnic u must arrive on this place

Name: abs0110
Title: Fun place to be
Review: Lucknow zoo never disappoints. Best place to spend you Sunday afternoon with Kids.The place is neat and clean. There are food stalls within the zoo.Other facilities include the boating place, 3d movie place, museum etc.

Name: John M
Title: Nice day out
Review: Plenty to see and do at the Zoo. Took us three hours to walk around to see all of the animals.  Two cafés and food stalls to stop at.  There is a train that takes you around the park or you can opt for an electric buggy. Animals all looked well cared for but their enclosures could be improved.  There is also an aquarium section, snake building and butterfly House. Low cost entrance at 60 rupees offers good value for money.

Name: parshant
Title: Beautiful park for kids
Review: This is a beautiful zoo park with neat and clean environment, there is amlmost all kind of animals like monkeys, lion, tiger, giraffe, beer etc big area takes 2 hour to visit and also there is a kids trains facility for quick visit.

Name: Arjun S
Title: Oh, the tigers!
Review: Had such a nice time at this zoo watching the tigers romp around during their morning exercise.  The zoo is neat and clean, with lots of space for the animals.  Well done, Lucknow Zoo!

Name: rsraghavan6
Title: Good nice
Review: I spend about 3 hours there with my family. I had a good experience there. It's really good for a nice family trip specially if you have children of age group between 5 to 14 years. The zoo has quite a good variety of animals including cat family, fox family, reptiles, birds, etc. Inside the zoo campus there a some nice food stalls, children park, and rest arena. Just inside the entrance gate on the left had side there is recently opened museum type facility which provides nice information about the history and the diversity of this park. There's also a 3d auditorium.

Name: 777vikas
Title: Very Good Zoo
Review: This zoo is located near to hazratganj. Opens early in the morning. You can find all types of animals, reptiles, birds here including Giraffe, rhynos, white tiger, lion, black panther, leopard, various types of snakes, python, owls, colorful birds. Toy train is a good attraction here for kids which covers the whole of zoo. There is a museum inside where and old plane is also placed. This zoo has a big seating and play area. Eatables are not allowed inside, there are eating points inside where you can enjoy lots of variety.

Name: Anjali P
Title: Delightful place
Review: Banarasi Bagh or Lucknow zoo is a very doable outing on foot for young famiLies, students and even oldies. With the installation of public toilets and a few eateries one can take a break from doing the rounds for a cup of tea or coffee. The state museum is also a treat, though some galleries need to be revamped. The Egyptian mummy is a star attraction in this museum.The tigers, lions, hippos and crocodiles seemed to be in good shape. But be sure to wear good, sturdy walking shoes to do the rounds of this zoo. Pathways have been tiled now so walking is easy. Plan for a three hour visit. And of course Hazratganj and its restaurants are just a ten minute walk from Banarasi Bagh. So happy walking and happy eating in the heart of Lucknow!

Name: 592abck
Title: Good place but dirty
Review: This place is good but not very well maintained. This place stinks and is very dirty. I found it bad.

Name: saurabh k
Title: Missing one man army 'hoolock gibbon  monkey"
Review: Still missing my favourite animal i. E. Hoolock gibbon. Few years back they died.They used to entertain the whole zoo alone.Once you tease them they use to make loud sound(hooko hooko). In the hope of their return i visited the zoo after 10 years but found nothing in their cage. Rest of the things are fine.

Name: pallavi a
Title: It was a fun experience
Review: Lucknow zoo has been under rennovation lately.We could spot various types of birds including Emu and Ostrich.Big cats like lion,white tiger,leopard.It was much greener now.Large varieties of fish could be seen.less reptiles were there.But overall it was fun.Big play area for kids.Butterfly park is a new addition.I liked it though it would be much fun in winters with lots of flowers blooming.Overall we loved the trip.

Name: dvatsa4u
Title: A Makeover Has made this place fantastic
Review: A must visit for children while visiting Lucknow.The Museum is too good and the Aquarium and the space for nocturnal creatures has been re done and so they are worth watching.

Name: Inspired_by_Xperiences
Title: A perfect place for a family outing with kids
Review: Zoo has always been an attraction for people of all ages, as you get to see many wildlife species which you would have otherwise seen only on television or in pictures. Lucknow zoo definitely has a variety of wild animals, birds and fish. While I found the zoo petty well maintained, somehow didn't find the animals being kept well. Though it's disheartening to see animals being captured in cages away from their natural habitat, but overall gives an opportunity to closely see these species. A must visit for all.

Name: Harsh V
Title: Good and nature friendly place
Review: It is the one of the best places in Lucknow it is Lucknow zoo it is very good place for family pacnic and friend group for outing it is fully natural things the animals also very good there many places inside where you and your family explore many things like museum where many historical things there which increase your knowledge in history which is a boring part of knowledge there boating there you can boat but is not so large it is small place for boating but make fun in it the big park are there your family sit under big tree and make relax you have to visit there you like this place the ticket price in Sunday is different it is 100 rupee per family half ticket is there on normal day it is 60 per member

Name: kkumar69
Title: IDEAL PLACE FOR ENTERTAINMENT
Review: situated in the heart of the city i.e. hazaratganj is an ideal place for whole family entertainment.

Name: Amit M
Title: Big Zoological Garden
Review: The Lucknow Zoo is having home to many species of animals and birds. Hukku Monkey is one of the major attraction of the Zoo. Good greenery, having restaurants and washroom facility is helping to devote good time there. A better place for Kids.

Name: Chandrma S
Title: Nice place
Review: I m going for there daily for morning walk.It is open for morning walkers daily 5am to 9 am on one rupees tickets.Outside gate there are many vendors who sell juices,fruits,green tea,coconut water and many more things.Also there are many flower excibition organise time to time from NBRI.great place 👌

Name: Sachin M
Title: Best place to hangout with family
Review: One of the best place go hangout with family whether young or old. Extremely low on budget and high on entertainment.

Name: shubhamag3
Title: Wide species of animals but not that much clean
Review: Lucknow zoo is having so many species of animals but some places are not clean. White tiger, Hippopotamus, Crocodiles, Ostrich are main attractions. Outside food and water bottles are not allowed inside.

Name: Rohit_G17
Title: Pretty good Zoo
Review: Lucknow Zoo is located at the centre of Lucknow near Hazratganj Chowk and is like any other zoo of India.The highlight was however the Giraffe and Ostrich...The bird park there is just amazing and has a huge variety. They also have an Own Centre and a Fish aquarium as well.Price Rs 60 per person.Train ride is recommended which takes you through the entire park. Rs 15 per person.

Name: Jaspreet K
Title: Very nice
Review: The Prince of Wales Edward VIII Zoological Gardens, popularly known as Lucknow Zoological Gardens, was established in the year 1921 to commemorate the visit of His Royal Highness, the Prince of Wales to Lucknow. The idea of establishing Zoological gardens at Lucknow emanated from Sir Harcourt Butler, the then Governor of the State and it was received enthusiastically by the prominent landlords and the leading citizens of the State who donated liberally for the construction of animal houses and cages and also presented animals and birds for display from time to time.A Committee of management was formed consisting of donors and other prominent citizens. Colonel Fanthorpe, Commissioner of Lucknow was appointed as the first President and Sheikh Maqbool Husain as first Secretary of the Commission. The Committee was registered under the Societies Registration Act on 17 August 1926.

Name: shahbaz h
Title: Outdated
Review: It was good but too much outdated , lack of all facilities like clean toilets, better food and benches... Number of animals like all sanaks, rhino 🦏 , etc..  no better facilities for animals too, they must work on cleanings and careing of animals, they have to add some new animals, and improve food canteens with normal rates. Thank you

Name: Deepti T
Title: Happy day with daughter
Review: It is a very nice place to go especially with children. Enjoyed the train ride. The variety of animals and birds are good.

Name: Sandeep V
Title: Very nice place
Review: Nawab Wazid Ali Sah Purani Udyan earlier known as the prince of wales zoological gardens, now known as Lucknow Zoological Garden. it was established in the year 1921 in the heart of capital city Uttar Pradesh. as for central zoo Authority of India, it is the large zoo in India. it was established in 1921 to commemorate the visits of his royal highness, the prince of wales to Lucknow. As per Zoo authority, there are various facilities available in this zoo for the visitors such as Indian & exotic animals, Birds, Reptile, Aquarium, Nocturnal House, State art Museum, interpretation center etc

Name: Rasheedur Rahman Shihab
Title: Nice Place
Review: A nice place to spend time with your friends or family. This place beautifies the city, Lucknow. The pride of Lucknow.

Name: gaurav
Title: Lucknow visit
Review: This zoological garden has a historical background. It is one of the most beautiful places to visit in lucknow. A variety of mammals , birds and reptiles are there at the garden. Toy train is available there. An Egyptian mummy in the museum is centre of attraction. This place is easily accessible. Overall a very good and beautiful place to visit in lucknow.

Name: Avneesh B
Title: Nice place to hang out
Review: Very nice place , lot of animals , specially  Bengal Tiger , Gir Lion , White Tiger , Himalayan Bear , Sloth Bear , Hona , Jackal , lot of birds , Ostrich , Emu ,  Cranes , Felicans and much more , A fish aquarium too , there is a museum ,children park , small boating area , and food court also . A very good zoo , animals are in a very good shape .A must visit place .

Name: khadds
Title: family entertianment
Review: Fav spot of my daughter, been here number of times. Lots of animals, birds, fishes, but best is free flight aviary with storks and other beautiful birds. This place also has a huge museum with paintings, sculptures from different times of past. Also has a toy train. One will need 4-5 hrs to do justice to this place. Only negative point is too many visitors.

Name: HOMPRS
Title: Well maintained and lively zoo
Review: Much better in terms of animals, the way they were being fed, cleanliness, space and path after entry to exit (Only Rs.60/pp). The map explains the route very well and if you stick to the route, u will not miss any animal. Oldies can opt to go by the toy train inside the zoo (less noisy and nice though it wont stop anywhere for you to see the animals from nearby)Note: Don,t miss the real mummy of a 13 year old girl that is kept in the lucknow museum inside the zoo (Rs.5 ticket). There are only 6-7 places in India were mummies are kept including lucknow.

Name: TravelnShutterbug
Title: Government should spend more than making parks
Review: A very old Zoo but unkept. The real attraction is the recently opened information centre. Must see before it is spoiled. Quite informative. The park has entry fee of 60 for adults. The zoo is in pathetic state and needs urgent attention. We went so that our entry fee at least contributed for the welfare of animals. There is a toy train for kids and for senior citizens there is golf cart buggy.

Name: sunilsine
Title: Zoo
Review: This is one of the best zoological garden of India.. I feel it's better from Delhi zoo. You can  visit all the area by  walk or  with the  tourist train. Here is  zoological Park, museum and in museum you can see mummy also.

Name: Footprints727663
Title: Fascinating
Review: I went to Lucknow Zoo. Some of the fascinating animals and birds such as Royal Bengal Tiger, White Tiger, Lion, Wolf, Great Pied Hornbill, Golden Pheasant and Silver Pheasant can be spotted here in their natural habitat. It is great place to go.

Name: StephanieO34
Title: Sad place
Review: The animals here all looked rather bored, woebegone and shabby, in similar compounds despite their different natures. One lonely giraffe typified what we saw.There were many local children there when we visited as it was "Children's Day", and the school parties were out in force - perhaps on a quieter day it might have been better, but somehow I doubt it. We did not see the whole zoo, as we were passing through on the way to the Museum, which is in the grounds.

Name: neha763
Title: Great place for kids
Review: Most all animals can be seen here. A very good experience for the kids. Lucknow zoo comes in as one of the India's best zoo.

Name: Aarav K
Title: It's Amazing
Review: Lucknow zoo is very big and full of many animals. The charm here will appeal to you. Everybody must go here.

Name: Pradyumna M
Title: Upgraded zoo of lucknow.
Review: My family visited there after long time and we saw that many things are changed like according to the passing years zoo is upgrading too.. Many good places to sit and enjoy a good view and have some food. Many things are there to watch and click some pics.

Name: nitesh1985
Title: intersting
Review: good place must go there ,fun will be there in your veins.different animal to see ,giraffe an gorillas .

Name: Rajani B
Title: Look out for Orangutan
Review: Setup in the 1920s, this is one of the large zoos in India. Collection is good. Special attractions are orangutan and Giraffe. Restaurants, Rest rooms, Drinking water facility is available. Video camera and still cameras are allowed.

Name: Pankaj G
Title: animals or eco picnic place for familes
Review: one of famous place in uttar pradesh. it's famous for his golf car and children train .museum will also there , and boating area, owl house, aquarium , snake house , and the best thing is one big Aeroplane has there. famous hukku monkey sounds great for visitors.

Name: ChiefExplorers
Title: Kids friendly
Review: Lucknow Zoo is a beautiful place to visit with your family. Its a kids friendly place which can be visited at any time of the year, preferably during winters.

Name: Pawan B
Title: Lucknow zoo
Review: This is a big zoo I never seen before and wide variety of birds,mammals and reptiles.I also visited Kanpur zoo but it has not this variety of animals .Toy train also attracting thing in this zoo

Name: aks19682003
Title: Place for nature lover
Review: Nice family place for nature lover best place for picnic kids enjoy this place and get in touch with the beauty of nature.

Name: Nikhil Sethi
Title: Lucknow Zoo
Review: A great place for the children to enjoy. They have a variety of animals for the whole family to enjoy. My daughter particularly loved the toy train.

Name: chirantansoor
Title: GOOD PLACE FOR FEW HOURS...
Review: Good collection of animals at wajidh ali shah zoo.specially white tigers.the bal rail ride is pretty good compared to other zoo's.but lots of area is poorly maintained and many cages are empty.good for kids ...

Name: durex p
Title: Awesome.zoo
Review: This zoo is famous for white tiger..lots of other animal also found here..this park also have lots of trees and have very greeny surrounding

Name: alec7393
Title: Lucknow
Review: I and my family go on Lucknow... When I rech Lucknow... I saw a zoo..this zoo is very big..and very animal here.

Name: Tabrez388
Title: Wonderful tour
Review: It was great time there I love the place it was beautiful and pleasure tour without any headache ambience was great

Name: Samanvya
Title: Neat and clean- but..
Review: Very neat very clean, but limited animals. The reptile section is especially disappointing as it has 100s of snakes and pythons but all of them of same variety. The biggest problems are the guests who will keep on teasing and irritating the animals just for fun. Do visit once- you get opportunity to see a few animals and birds really close.

Name: Travel732059
Title: Good place for outing with kids
Review: One of my favorite places to visit with my family, clean place, not very expensive & good food outlets

Name: Sapan Banga
Title: Ok ok
Review: Animals here are weak, had to walk very much and the weather was not helping, too hot and humid. Eating joints here are not clean and henceforth not gud

Name: randhirt2017
Title: FAMILY PLACE
Review: As i have been there many times i would personally recommend everyone to visit one's if you are at Lucknow

Name: Yogesh T
Title: A small zoo
Review: It is a zoo situated near the local colonies, with limited animals and that too looks like sick, and with no facilities like packaged drinking water, water is available on cart per glass which tastes like salty, and no cafe anything to eat there

Name: Susej B
Title: A casual visit !
Review: The aim was to renew our childhood memories of this place. S very compact and well organized Zoo considering the size. The Museum co-located inside the Zoo was the main attraction for us.

Name: KISHORE S
Title: Noisy visitors, silent wild life.
Review: The Zoo is situated in the heart of city, next to Hazratganj. If you are traveling by car, go to the gate near Police headquarter of Lucknow. Ample parking in available. The fee at INR 60 is rather high for a big group. Try not to go on a public holiday, as you are likely to face huge noisy crowd. Too many eating places within the premises make it more of a picnic spot than a real Zoo. However, the toy train is good for kids. Ask at the gate if the museum is open.

Name: Nitish N
Title: Zoo
Review: I visited this place in april 2017 with my family and found it worth visiting.. it is bigger and more variety of animals in there.. should visit in the autumn..

Name: Stupid E
Title: Lucknow Zoo is Amazing
Review: Lucknow zoo is full of animals, you will see one of the amazing animals from here. This zoo is awesome. There can be no better place than to go with your family or friends.

Name: Rakesh s
Title: Lucknow Zoooo
Review: Zoos are always beautiful with its animals in it. The place is very big and awesome to visit. Have a try.

Name: Vibhu S
Title: Zoo
Review: This common place having zoo in all city in India but we enjoy holiday in zoo with full joyful and family place

Name: vikas9743
Title: Nice place for mini picnic wid small kids
Review: Must go for toy train ride kids enjoy watching animal from train ride.... good place to visit if your child curious about animals....this zoo also have museum aquarium....

Name: amitverma091
Title: A day with real animal
Review: As mentioned in the title, if you want to see some amazing animals in real then you really need to visit it.

Name: greatsamar
Title: Must visit
Review: Covered in very big area.. has various kind of animals . Its a good picnic spot but take of climate . If it is hot then you may not like the place

Name: vikram218
Title: Pleasantly Surprised  !!!
Review: If you are coming here thinking it's a zoo in Lucknow, UP and not a zoo in metro.....Well think twice. It's one of the best maintained zoo in India. Lots of variety of most of the species. Tigers are a treat to watch..... Must visit with your family and friends.

Name: TRYVL
Title: Must visit
Review: A must visit spot in Lucknow,can enjoy different activities there other than bird and animal spotting.

Name: UTKARSH PRATAP S
Title: A great place for nature lovers
Review: A good weather and free time can add happiness to your visit and the birds amd animals makes you feel amazing

Name: Shubham669
Title: Visit
Review: We have great fun with animals here although cleanness of zoo is one of the big problem and government must aware of it ..but awesome place to visit

Name: rockzzM77
Title: Good one
Review: Lucknow zoo situated near hazratganj, nice place.This zoo having lots of animals, burds, it's always nice to go there.

Name: Puneet A
Title: Interesting for families with children
Review: This place is perhaps good for families with children. There weren't too many animals to see and the place is not too well maintained, but okay for a picnic.

Name: anu m
Title: Quite large zoo
Review: The Lucknow zoo is quite large and also hosts all kind of animals. A very good place for bringing your children along.

Name: mishra712
Title: Refreshing outing
Review: Lucknow zoo has a big advantage compared to a lot of other newer zoos in different cities - its location. It is located right next to Hazratganj and now houses probably as many specimen as it would have ever did. A few sections were a disappointment as still not fully functional (e.g., nocturnal section). There is ample amount of attraction for young children in terms of open spaces/lawns and play grounds (with swings, slides, merry go rounds etc) and also the mini zoo train. It's a perfect outing on a sunny winter!

Name: sun_abhay
Title: Great place to enjoy a day with family, friends
Review: Saw lot of improvement and facilities at zoo visiting after a long time. Nice maintenance of animal shelters and museum. Toy train give a great ride. Need significant improvements in fooding facilities.  Over enjoyed the place.

Name: Pradeep Ambat
Title: Good visit
Review: Had a good visit to d Lucknow zoo. The big cats were d main attraction with asiatic lion,White tiger,leopards etc. the toy train adds to d charm. You need to devote 3 to 4 hrs to explore the complete zoo. A good place to vis with d family.
